phases.name: Setup
phases.long: Neutral grip, soft knees, long spine; 55/45 pressure lead-to-trail under arches. Ball position fits club.

phases.name: Shaft Parallel (Backswing)
phases.long: Hands in front of chest, gradual wrist set; face near toe-up, not shut/open.

phases.name: Lead Arm Parallel (Backswing)
phases.long: Full torso turn; trail elbow folds in front of ribcage; maintain width.

phases.name: Top of Swing
phases.long: Pressure into trail heel; trail hip deep; lead wrist closer to flat/bowed; head steady.

phases.name: Lead Arm Parallel (Downswing)
phases.long: Pelvis leads, then torso, then arms; shaft shallows; pressure shifts to lead mid-foot.

phases.name: Shaft Parallel (Downswing)
phases.long: Hands slightly ahead of clubhead; face in path window; pelvis still turning.

phases.name: Impact
phases.long: Forward handle; low point forward; pelvis 30–45° open; chest 10–20° open; lead leg braced.

phases.name: Trail Arm Parallel (Follow-Through)
phases.long: Trail arm extends; handle moves around (not down the line); no flip.

phases.name: Finish
phases.long: Weight fully lead side; belt buckle/chest to target; stable hold-the-pose.
